pkgmetadata.longdescription: # kraken-cli[![Python application](https://github.com/kraken-build/kraken-cli/actions/workflows/python-package.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kraken-build/kraken-cli/actions/workflows/python-package.yml)[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/kraken-cli.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/kraken-cli)The command-line interface to the Kraken CLI.
